contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=June 2013}} {{Orphan|date=December 2012}} {{Infobox journal | title = Algorithms | discipline = [[computer science]] | abbreviation = Entropy | publisher = [[MDPI]] | country = | frequency = Quarterly issues, | history = 2008-present | openaccess = Yes | website = http://www.mdpi.com/journal/algorithms | ISSN = 1999-4893 }} '''"Algorithms"''' (plural of [[algorithm]]) is a [[Peer review|peer-reviewed]] [[open access]] [[scientific journal]] "of [[computer science]], theory, methods and interdisciplinary applications, data and information systems, [[software engineering]], [[artificial intelligence]], [[automation]] and [[control systems]].".<ref>http://www.mdpi.com/journal/algorithms</ref> It was established in 2008 and is published by [[MDPI]]. == References == {{Reflist}} == External links == * {{Official website|http://www.mdpi.com/journal/algorithms}} [[Category:Computer science journals]] [[Category:Open access journals]] [[Category:Multidisciplinary Digital Publishing Institute academic journals]] [[Category:Quarterly journals]] [[Category:English-language journals]] [[Category:Publications established in 2008]]
